application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the proposal would not result in the risk of flooding to and from the site, contrary to policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required by condition 9 (SuDS (Details)) of permission 22/00259/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 20/02901/FUL (Erection of three storey 4 bedroom detached house with associated landscaping, car parking, cycle storage and amenity space) dated 04/06/2021. Variation to include ground floor rear and side extension and internal changes)
